name: Drive to Hell

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Ghost Crab Games/Drive to Hell/DriveToHell.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the IndieGameStand installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Ghost Crab Games/Drive to Hell/DriveToHell.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $file1
- task:
    executable: $CACHE/DriveToHellSetup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
